snippet: The Hamptons will play host to not one but two potential 2016 presidential aspirants this month, with Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. vacationing in Southampton and Hillary Rodham Clinton renting a house in East Hampton for August.
abstract: The Hamptons will play host to not one but two potential 2016 presidential aspirants this month, with Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. vacationing in Southampton and Hillary Rodham Clinton renting a house in East Hampton for August.
